item.title: Manage your public DNS zones with Azure DNS
item.description: On May 4 2015, Microsoft has released a public preview of a new Microsoft Azure feature â€“ Azure DNS. Azure DNS is a hosting service for DNS domains, providing name resolution using Microsoft Azure infrastructure.
